h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Umbral Abyss Location
content: The Umbral Abyss Transformation Spell can be obtained from the Mahavira Hall Shrine in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. From the Shrine, head up into the large temple and defeat Yellowbrow and then the Macaque Chief for the final time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Umbral_Abyss.md', within the main section titled 'Umbral Abyss', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Umbral Abyss Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Umbral Abyss Transformation Spell can be obtained from the Mahavira Hall Shrine in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. From the Shrine, head up into the large temple and defeat Yellowbrow and then the Macaque Chief for the final time.
